REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C G f0412 reute u f BC-CARGILL-U.K.-STRIKE-T 03-25 0060

TEXT.TITLE: CARGILL U.K. STRIKE TALKS TO RESUME THIS AFTERNOON
TEXT.BODY: Talks between Cargill U.K. Ltd's management and unions, aimed at ending the prolonged strike at its Seaforth oilseed processing plant, will resume this afternoon, a company spokesman said. Yesterday's session failed to reach a compromise but some progress was made, he said. REUTER
